text:
Jof Davies has in-depth understanding of video compression, codecs, and delivery formats.

Capabilities:
- Encoding optimisation using HandBrake, ffmpeg, and custom presets.
- Bitrate targeting for web, mobile, livestream, and archival delivery.
- Codec selection including H.264, H.265/HEVC, and ProRes offline workflows.
- Creating automation-friendly presets for consistent proxy generation.
- Structuring final deliverables to meet platform-specific requirements.

This skill supports high-volume content production with minimal delivery issues.
